snippet: “The Devil Inside,” a horror movie acquired by Paramount Pictures for $1 million, was a strong No. 1 at the North American box office over the weekend.
abstract: “The Devil Inside,” a horror movie acquired by Paramount Pictures for $1 million, was a strong No. 1 at the North American box office over the weekend.

headline.main: 'The Devil Inside' Has a Low Budget but a Big Take
